Title: The Stranded
Plot: Jerry & Elaine go to a party with George, while there they send signals to each other to get out of bad party conversations. Afterward, George abandons them there, when he leaves with a co-worker he has a chance with. Jerry & Elaine keeping the hosts up real late, while waiting for Kramer to come and pick them up. The host later takes Jerry up on his offer to drop by when he is in the city, just as Jerry is leaving. He stays in Jerry's apartment for the evening and parties with Kramer and a lady
Writer: Larry David, Jerry Seinfeld, Matt Goldman
GuestStars: Larry David, Michael Chiklis, Teri Austin, Bobbi Jo Lathan, Gwen Shepherd, Dwayne Kennedy, Marcia Firesten, Michael Milhoan, John Putch, Melissa Weil, Ellen Ratner, Frank Piazza
